description: Try our easy to follow Spanish-Style Chicken & Potatoes With Romesco Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken dishes,Microwave,High fibre,High protein,Low salt,Low sugar,Chicken,Potato
name: SpanishStyle Chicken & Potatoes With Romesco Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large red onion, cut into thin wedges

recipeInstructions.text: Place potatoes in a heatproof, microwavesafe dish. Cover with plastic wrap. Microwave on high for 3 to 4 minutes or until just tender. Drain, quarter and place into a bowl.

Place capsicum, almonds, garlic, tomato paste, paprika and chilli flakes into a small food processor and process until finely chopped and well combined. With processor motor running, slowly add 1/4 cup of the oil and process until sauce is almost smooth. Season with salt and pepper (makes about 11/3 cups).

Heat remaining oil in a large, deep frying pan over mediumhigh heat. Cook chicken in batches for 3 minutes or until browned. Transfer to a bowl. Add chorizo, onion and potatoes to pan. Cook, stirring often, for 10 minutes or until golden. Return chicken to pan. Add 1/3 cup water and cover. Cook for 5 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Roughly chop half the oregano and stir through chicken mixture. Serve sprinkled with remaining oregano and sauce on the side.
